price: ߝߎߦߊߝߎߦߊ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߓߊ߲߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߕߊ ߘߐ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߡߍߣߍ߲߫
arabic: فِي ٱلۡحَمِيمِ ثُمَّ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يُسۡجَرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fī al-ḥamīmi thumma fī al-nāri yus'jarūna
